name: Equiniti Limited
membership: ICSA Registrars Group, UK Custody Working Group, Receiving Agent Group
goal: Equiniti Limited is a leading UK Registrar.  We are appointed under legal contract as agent to some of the largest UK companies (for whom we maintain millions of shareholder records) to keep and maintain their shareholder registers and to provide a range of services to the corporate company’s investors.  This includes the extending of shareholder rights in accordance with UK securities laws (UK Companies Act, the Act) and regulations.  As such we are pleased to have the opportunity to respond to EU consultations that will impact the products and services that we provide.
interests: Banking and financial services, Business and Industry, Communication, Digital economy and society, Economy, finance and the euro, Employment and Social Affairs, Fraud prevention, International co-operation and development, Research and innovation, Single market, Trade
